root.name: Celtic Legends
root.description: Eskel and Sogrom are the greatest magicians in the land and are so hungry for power that they've been at war for a long time. Now the war is nearing it's end but neither one wants to give up.Celtic Legends is a turn based strategy game in which you must destroy the other wizards forces on 23 islands. Holding on to castles will grant you more magic, more magic means a bigger army and a bigger army of course means more fun putting your enemies to the sword.
